steps.step: Strip the corn until it's just the cob
Place four cups of water into a pot and place the cobs inside.

steps.note: This is to infuse the water with corn flavoring and scents

steps.step: Remove the cobs and put in the corn bits
Boil the corn bits for 10-15 mins
steps.note: This time may differ depending on the quality/freshness of the corn

steps.step: Add the cup of sugar and stir
Continue to add sugar to taste
Now make the tapioca starch mixture
Combine the tapioca starch into a cup of water to loosen/dissolve the starch
Pour the mixture into the pot and stir for 10-15 mins until the chè thickens
Once the chè clears up, it'll be done

name: Phở
steps: Assemble noodles, broth, and beef slices.
